markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Skeletal Horse](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3195)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Skeletal horses are sometimes used as mounts by monsters or other undead.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Skeletal_Horse.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Skeletal Horse](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3195)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=652" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=772" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=722" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 313 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +8 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 33
([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83))

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) 5, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586) 5, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) 5, piercing 5, slashing 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hoof +9,
**Damage** 1d8+5 bludgeoning

**Gallop** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The horse Strides twice, with its Speed increased by 10 feet.

**Undead Steed**   Undead and creatures allied with them can [Command](/Actions.aspx?ID=2400)a skeletal horse without needing to attempt a skill check.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-472" />
name: Skeletal Horse
